review.body:
## Cursor Bugbot Analysis

Found potential security vulnerability in authentication middleware.

comments.body:
### Bug: Authentication Bypass
<!-- **Critical Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Potential authentication bypass vulnerability detected in middleware validation.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

**Impact**: Could allow unauthorized access to protected routes.

**Suggested Fix**: Add proper input validation and sanitization before authentication checks.

review.body:
## Cursor Bugbot Analysis

Found multiple issues in this PR that need attention.

comments.body:
### Bug: Authentication Bypass
<!-- **Critical Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Security vulnerability in authentication flow.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

### Suggestion: Performance Improvement
<!-- **Low Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Consider memoizing this component to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

### Bug: Input Validation Missing
<!-- **High Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
User input is not properly validated before processing.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

review.body:
## Cursor Bugbot Analysis

Detected performance optimization opportunities.

comments.body:
### Suggestion: Virtualization Needed
<!-- **Medium Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Large dataset rendering without virtualization causes performance issues.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

**Impact**: Poor user experience with large datasets.

**Suggested Fix**: Implement react-window or similar virtualization library.

### Bug: Memory Leak
<!-- **High Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Effect cleanup not properly implemented, causing memory leaks.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

review.body:
## Cursor Bugbot Analysis

Code quality improvements needed.

comments.body:
### Suggestion: Type Safety
<!-- **Medium Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Consider using stricter TypeScript types for better type safety.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->

### Suggestion: Accessibility
<!-- **Low Severity** -->
<!-- DESCRIPTION START -->
Missing ARIA labels for screen reader accessibility.
<!-- DESCRIPTION END -->
